#summary Boto Downloads on github.com

Releases of boto can now be downloaded from [http://pypi.python.org/pypi/boto/ PyPI] or from [http://github.com/ GitHub] rather than on Google Code.  To access the github downloads, visit:

https://github.com/boto/boto/downloads


You can still view the original downloads lists here:

http://code.google.com/p/boto/downloads/list
